Translations.Text: Awi yasen d amedya n sin irgazen. I yiwen, Nefka snat tebeirin n teuoin, Nezzi yasent tizdayin, Nerra iger garasent
Yal tibeirt teppak ed l$ella s, ur ipxuuuu, segs, wacemma. Nesfeggev asif garasent
I$ellet ed ppemoa. Inna i umdakwel is, mi s immeslay: "$elbe$ k taokunt, iffe$ k alag
Idens iman is mi ikcem leonan is, inna: "ur cukke$ ara, d awez$i, ad iqucc wayagi
Ur cukke$ ara ad yili yimir, u ma bbwve$ ar Mass iw, ard affe$, war ccekk, ayen yifen aya, deg umekkan is
Inna yas umdakwel is, mi s immeslay: "day tnekoev Win ik Ixelqen seg wakal, sinna, si tiqqit, sinna, Imessel ik d argaz
Maca, Neppa d Oebbi, Mass iw. Ur pcarake$ yiwen, i Mass iw
Lemmer id tenniv, mi tkecmev ar tebeirt ik: akken Irad Oebbi. Ur telli tezmert siwa s$uo Oebbi. Ma twalav iyi d, nek, tifev iyi ayla, tarwa
Izmer Mass iw ad iyi d Ifk ayen i ifen tibeirt ik. A d Iazen $uoes ssxev, seg igenni, a ppu$al d aeecraruf issiccigen
ne$, ad zzren waman is, ur ten teppafev, d awez$i
Tqucc l$ella s. D$a la izeyyeo ifassen is, $ef wayen iseooef fellas. Tqucc tfeooant is. Inna: "a yamxix iw, a lemmer ur curke$ yiwen, i Mass iw
Ur as illi urbaa ara t isellken, war Oebbi. Ur isellek iman is
Akka, laanaya s$uo Oebbi, Tidep. Yif akw i ukafi, Yif akw i taggara
Awi yasen d amedya n tmeddurt n ddunit. Am aman id Nesse$li seg igenni. Ealualen yissen im$an n tmurt. D$a u$alen d asa$uo, issebruzzaa iten wavu. Ni$ Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
Ayla akked dderya d ccbaea n tmeddurt n ddunit. Ar Mass ik, leulae idumen ifen ten i ukafi, ifen ten i tmeooiwt
Ass ideg ara Nesseleu idurar, a pwaliv tamurt d aza$ao. A ten Nefser, ur Neppaoa yiwen segsen
A d rsen zdat Mass ik, d leufuf: "ni$ tusam aÂ£ d, akken ikwen Nexleq tikelt tamenzut. Irna tetebbtem ar ur awen Neppara ppaaud, d awez$i

Ters ed Tezmamt. A pwaliv ibe$wviyen s ueebbio, $ef wayen illan degs. Qqaoen: "a yamxix nne$! Acimi tazmamt agi ur teooi ayen meeeiyen, u wayen meqqwoen, armi ten teeseb"? Ufan illa wayen xedmen. Mass ik ur Idennis yiwen

Mi Nenna i lmalayek: "knumt i Adem", knant, siwa Iblis. Neppa, si leonun, iaaua lameo n Mass is. Day a ten terrem, neppa akked tarwa s, d imawlan, war Nek? U nitni d icenga nnwen! D abdil ucmit n imednas
